title: Stock Futures Inch Up Ahead of GDP Data
sub_head: Results are due after the close from Amazon and Apple
body:
U.S. stock futures edged up ahead of jobless figures, an advance estimate of third-quarter gross domestic product and another volley of corporate earnings reports.
Futures on the S&P 500 strengthened 0.2% and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were up 0.2%. The contracts donâ€™t necessarily predict market moves after the markets open.
